content: The file format that our server accepts. For the time being, only include PDF format. We will support other document and archive formats in the future.

The file format we support converting to.
Standard: PNG, SVG
Extended: PNG, SVG, JPEG, TIFF
The size, in bytes, for a single upload. This rule will be adjusted separately between compressed file size and unpacked file size in future.
Number of files allowed to convert per day, daily reset at 0:00.
The lifespan of the output file continues to be stored on our system, starting from the moment you successfully perform the conversion.
User-desired adjustments to the output file. E.g: DPI, page sizes, etc.
